name: malevy.github.io
body:
### Welcome to my corner of the Internet.
Being that this is my space (one of many actually), I reserve the right to publish whatever I chose, regardless of the its perceived value.

### About me
I have been delivering software solutions to clients, in a variety of industries, for over 20 years. I am an active participate in the software community and, through the years, have spoken on a variety of topics at multiple conferences and user groups.

## My other properties on the Internet
[Me on LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelalevy)
[Me on GitHub](https://github.com/malevy)
[Of course Twitter](https://twitter.com/malevy)
[Let's not forget email](malevy@outlook.com)
[I'm into photography. Check out Flickr](https://www.flickr.com/photos/malevy)

### disclaimer & copyright
The opinions expressed herein are my own personal opinions (and maybe best guesses) and do not represent my employer's view in any way.

All content is provided "AS IS" with no warranties and confers no rights
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
